thread.title: 8 questions for Jeb Bush
thread.title_full: 8 questions for Jeb Bush - CBS News

author: CBS News
title: 8 questions for Jeb Bush
text:
From their first priority in the White House to favorite authors and evening drinks of choice, "CBS This Morning" is getting to know 2016 presidential candidates backstage.
After his interview at the table in Studio 57, Bush filled out our questionnaire:

Hello my name is... Jeb Bush
My first priority when I enter the White House will be... Restore American leadership in the world
I believe the government's responsibility to its citizens is... Protect our shores, help with the vulnerable, promote rule of law
Before giving a campaign speech, I... take a deep breath
My favorite author is... Bryson
My morning drink of choice is... coffee
My evening drink of choice is... red wine
On a regular night I get 7 hours of sleep. 
If I could ask one other candidate one question... Why don't you like me? :)
